meta.title: About Transformer Labs
meta.description: Learn about Transformer Labs - AI development company specializing in practical business solutions. Based in Palestine and UK.

hero.title: About Transformer Labs
hero.subtitle: We build AI solutions that solve real business problems. Founded in 2023, we work with companies worldwide to implement practical AI applications that deliver measurable results.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Transformer Labs was founded with a simple mission: make AI accessible and practical for businesses of all sizes. We saw too many companies struggling with experimental AI projects that never delivered real value.
story.p2: Our approach is different. We focus on proven AI technologies and practical implementations that integrate seamlessly with existing business processes. No hype, no unrealistic promises – just reliable AI solutions that work.
story.p3: Based in Palestine and the United Kingdom, we serve clients globally, with particular expertise in Middle Eastern and European markets.

practical.title: Practical AI
practical.description: Solutions that solve real business problems, not experimental tech

reliable.title: Reliable Delivery
reliable.description: Proven track record of on-time, on-budget project completion

communication.title: Clear Communication
communication.description: No technical jargon – we explain everything in business terms

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: We stick around to ensure your AI solutions continue working

global.title: Our Global Presence
global.subtitle: Strategic locations in Scotland and Palestine enable us to serve clients across Europe, the Middle East, and beyond

specialize.title: What We Specialize In
specialize.subtitle: We focus on AI applications with proven business value

conversational.title: Conversational AI
conversational.description: Customer service chatbots, internal assistants, and AI agents that handle real conversations with customers and employees.

dataAnalytics.title: Data & Analytics
dataAnalytics.description: Automated reporting, predictive analytics, and intelligent insights that help you make better business decisions.

processAutomation.title: Process Automation
processAutomation.description: Streamline workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and optimize business processes using intelligent automation.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Systems
knowledge.description: AI that searches through your documents and data to provide instant answers to questions from your team or customers.

generative.title: Generative AI
generative.description: Content generation, writing assistance, and creative AI tools customized for your specific business needs.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: Purpose-built AI applications designed specifically for your industry, use case, and technical requirements.

businessFirst.title: Business-First Approach
businessFirst.description: We start by understanding your business goals, not the technology. Our AI solutions are designed to integrate with your existing processes and deliver measurable improvements to your operations.

transparent.title: Transparent Communication
transparent.description: We keep you informed every step of the way. No technical jargon, no hidden costs, no surprises. You'll always know what we're building, why we're building it, and when it will be ready.

flexible.title: Flexible Partnership
flexible.description: Whether you need a one-off project, ongoing development support, or strategic consulting, we adapt our services to your needs and timeline.

longTerm.title: Long-term Success
longTerm.description: We build solutions that grow with your business and provide ongoing support to ensure they continue delivering value as your needs evolve.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.name: Mohammad Othman
leadership.bio: AI engineer with deep expertise in building practical business applications. Focused on delivering reliable solutions that solve real problems rather than experimental technology. Based between Palestine and the UK.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.subtitle: Whether you have a specific AI project in mind or want to explore how AI can benefit your business, let's start a conversation.

Intelligent search across all your content

deployment.description: We deploy your solution to your environment, provide comprehensive training for your team, and offer ongoing support to ensure long-term success.

ongoing.title: Development Partnerships
ongoing.description: Long-term collaboration as your AI development team.

consulting.title: Strategic Guidance
consulting.description: AI planning, technical review, and strategic advice.

q1.question: How do you handle projects across different time zones?
q1.answer: We work with clients globally and are flexible with meeting times. Most communication happens via email and scheduled video calls at mutually convenient times. Our offices in Scotland and Palestine allow us to provide coverage across multiple time zones.

q2.question: Do you work with startups or only established companies?
q2.answer: We work with companies of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises. Our approach adapts to your company's stage and requirements.

q3.question: What's your typical project timeline?
q3.answer: It depends on the scope, but most projects range from 2-12 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase.

q4.question: Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer various support arrangements including maintenance, updates, and expansion of existing systems.

q5.question: Can you work with our existing development team?
q5.answer: Absolutely. We often collaborate with internal teams and can provide training and knowledge transfer as needed.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.subtitle: Send us an email with your project details and we'll get back to you within 24 hours with next steps.

meta.title: Careers - Join Transformer Labs
meta.description: Join our team of AI engineers and software developers. Remote-first culture with flexible hours. Help build the future of AI applications for businesses worldwide.

hero.title: Join Our Team
hero.subtitle: We're building the future of AI applications for businesses worldwide. Join a team that values expertise, creativity, and work-life balance.

why.title: Why Work With Us
why.subtitle: We're not just building AI solutions – we're creating the future of how businesses work, and we want the best people to help us get there.

impact.title: Meaningful Impact
impact.description: Your work directly shapes how businesses worldwide use AI. Every solution you build solves real problems for real companies.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: Work with the latest AI technologies and frameworks. We invest in the best tools and give you freedom to innovate.

opportunities.title: Small Team, Big Opportunities
opportunities.description: Shape the direction of the company. Your ideas matter, your voice is heard, and your contributions make a real difference.

benefits.title: Benefits & Culture
benefits.subtitle: We believe great work happens when people have the freedom and support they need

flexibleHours.title: Flexible Hours
flexibleHours.description: Work when you're most productive. Core overlap hours for collaboration, but flexibility to manage your schedule.

remote.title: Remote-First Culture
remote.description: Work from anywhere. Our team spans multiple countries and time zones, and we've built processes that support distributed work.

pto.title: Unlimited PTO
pto.description: Take the time you need to recharge. We trust our team to manage their time responsibly and take care of themselves.

learningBudget.title: Learning Budget
learningBudget.description: Annual budget for courses, conferences, books, and certifications. We invest in your professional development.

innovationTime.title: Innovation Time
innovationTime.description: Dedicated time for exploring new technologies, working on side projects, and contributing to open source.

mentorship.title: Direct Mentorship
mentorship.description: Work directly with experienced engineers and get personalized guidance on your career development.

roles.title: Open Roles
roles.subtitle: We're always looking for exceptional engineers to join our team

aiEngineer.title: AI Engineer
aiEngineer.description: Build and deploy AI solutions for enterprise clients. Work with LLMs, computer vision, and custom ML models.
requirements: 3+ years experience with Python and ML frameworks
Knowledge of vector databases and embeddings
Experience with cloud deployment (AWS, GCP, Azure)
bonus: Experience with RAG systems and retrieval workflows

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
fullStack.description: Build web applications and APIs that power our AI solutions. Focus on performance, scalability, and user experience.
requirements: 4+ years experience with modern web frameworks
Strong knowledge of React, Node.js, TypeScript
Experience with databases and API design

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.intro: We'd love to hear from you! Send us an email with:
items: Your CV/resume attached
The position you're interested in
A brief introduction about yourself
Why you want to work with Transformer Labs
Any relevant projects or portfolio links

general.title: Don't See Your Role?
general.subtitle: We're always interested in hearing from exceptional engineers, even if we don't have an open position that matches your background exactly. Send us your details and we'll keep you in mind for future opportunities.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Transformer Labs
meta.description: Transformer Labs Privacy Policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in compliance with international data protection laws.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

companyInfo.title: Company Information
companyInfo.legalEntityValue: Transformer Innovation Co. for Programming and Artificial Intelligence

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.p1: Transformer Labs ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or engage with us professionally.
s1.p2: This policy applies to all users of our website and clients of our AI development and software engineering services.

s2_1.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
items: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number, company name, job title
Project Information: Requirements, specifications, business needs, technical details
Communication Records: Emails, messages, meeting notes, project correspondence
Payment Information: Billing details, payment records (processed securely through third parties)
Professional Information: CV/resume data for career applications

s2_2.title: 2.2 Information We Collect Automatically
items: Website Usage: IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent
Technical Data: Browser settings, operating system, referring websites
Analytics Data: User interactions, website performance metrics (when analytics are implemented)
Cookies: Session data, preferences, authentication tokens

s2_3.title: 2.3 Information from Third Parties
items: Professional Networks: LinkedIn and other business platforms
Client Systems: Data accessed during project delivery (with authorization)
Reference Checks: Information from professional references

s3_1.title: 3.1 Service Delivery
items: Providing AI development and software engineering services
Project management, communication, and collaboration
Technical support and maintenance
Quality assurance and testing

s3_2.title: 3.2 Business Operations
items: Processing payments and managing accounts
Responding to inquiries and providing customer support
Improving our services and website functionality
Compliance with legal and regulatory requirements

s3_3.title: 3.3 Communication
items: Sending project updates and status reports
Providing technical documentation and deliverables
Sharing relevant industry insights (with consent)
Recruitment and career-related communications

s3_4.title: 3.4 Legal Basis for Processing
s3_4.intro: We process your data based on:
items: Contract Performance: To deliver services you've contracted for
Legitimate Interest: To operate our business and improve services
Consent: Where you've explicitly agreed to specific uses
Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws

s4.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
s4.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share your information in these limited circumstances:

s4_1.title: 4.1 Service Providers
items: Cloud Hosting: GitHub, hosting providers for secure code storage
Communication: Email providers, video conferencing platforms
Payment Processing: Financial institutions and payment processors
Analytics: Website analytics providers (when implemented)

s4_2.title: 4.2 Legal Requirements
items: When required by law or legal process
To protect our rights, property, or safety
To prevent fraud or illegal activities
In connection with business transfers or mergers

s4_3.title: 4.3 International Transfers
s4_3.content: We may transfer your data internationally for business operations. When we do, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

s5.title: 5. Data Security
s5.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
items: Encryption: Data in transit and at rest
Access Controls: Limited access on a need-to-know basis
Secure Systems: Regular security updates and monitoring
Staff Training: Regular privacy and security awareness training
Incident Response: Procedures for handling security breaches
s5.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

s6.title: 6. Data Retention
s6.intro: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to:
items: Provide our services and fulfill contractual obligations
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
Resolve disputes and enforce agreements
Maintain business records for operational purposes
periods: Active Projects: Duration of engagement plus 3 years
Financial Records: 7 years for tax and legal compliance
Marketing Data: Until you opt-out or 3 years of inactivity

s7.title: 7. Your Rights
s7.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights: Access: Request copies of your personal data
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
Deletion: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
Portability: Request transfer of your data in a structured format
Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
Restriction: Request limitation of processing activities
Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for consent-based processing
s7.exercise: To exercise your rights, contact us at
s7.subjectLine: with "Data Protection Request" in the subject line.

s8.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
s8.intro: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
items: Remember your preferences and settings
Analyze website usage and performance
Provide secure access to client areas
Improve user experience and functionality
s8.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

s9.title: 9. International Users
s9.intro: We serve clients globally and comply with applicable data protection laws including:
items: GDPR (EU/UK): For European clients and visitors
CCPA (California): For California residents
Local Laws: Applicable regulations in client jurisdictions
s9.euRights: If you are located in the EU or UK, you have additional rights under GDPR, including the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

s10.title: 10. Children's Privacy
s10.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

s11.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
s11.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of material changes by:
items: Posting the updated policy on our website
Sending email notifications to active clients
Providing notice during your next interaction with us
s11.acceptance: Your continued use of our services after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

s12.title: 12. Contact Us
s12.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
s12.responseTime: We will respond to privacy-related inquiries within 30 days.

meta.title: Terms of Service - Transformer Labs
meta.description: Transformer Labs Terms of Service. Legal terms and conditions for our AI development and software engineering services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Legal terms and conditions for our AI development and software engineering services

importantNotice.title: Important Legal Agreement
importantNotice.content: By accessing our website or engaging our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

s1.title: 1. Company Information
s1.legalEntityValue: Transformer Innovation Co. for Programming and Artificial Intelligence

s2.title: 2. Definitions
items: "Company," "we," "us," "our" refers to Transformer Labs
"Client," "you," "your" refers to the individual or entity engaging our services
"Services" refers to AI development, software engineering, consulting, and related professional services
"Deliverables" refers to work products, code, documentation, and other materials created for you
"Agreement" refers to these Terms plus any project-specific contracts or statements of work
"Confidential Information" refers to non-public information disclosed by either party

s3_1.title: 3.1 Service Description
items: AI system development and implementation
Custom software engineering and development
Machine learning model development and deployment
Data analytics and business intelligence solutions
Technical consulting and strategy advisory
System integration and automation

s3_2.title: 3.2 Service Scope
s3_2.intro: The specific scope, timeline, and deliverables for each project will be defined in:
items: Written proposals and estimates
Statements of Work (SOW)
Project contracts and amendments
Email confirmations of scope changes

s3_3.title: 3.3 Client Responsibilities
items: Provide accurate and complete project requirements
Grant necessary access to systems, data, and personnel
Respond to requests for information within reasonable timeframes
Designate authorized representatives for project decisions
Ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations
Maintain confidentiality of our methodologies and processes

s4_1.title: 4.1 Fees and Payment
items: Fees are specified in project proposals and contracts
Payment terms are net 30 days from invoice date unless otherwise agreed
Invoices are sent electronically to your designated contact
Payment is typically made via bank transfer to our designated account
All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes, which you are responsible for

s4_2.title: 4.2 Late Payment
items: Late payments incur interest at 2% per month (24% annually)
We may suspend services for accounts more than 15 days overdue
Collections costs and legal fees are your responsibility
No right to offset without our written agreement

s4_3.title: 4.3 Expenses
s4_3.intro: You will reimburse pre-approved expenses including:
items: Third-party software licenses and subscriptions
Cloud computing and hosting costs
Travel expenses for on-site work (when approved)
Specialized hardware or equipment purchases

s5_1.title: 5.1 Client Deliverables
s5_1.intro: Upon full payment, you will own:
items: Custom code developed specifically for your project
Documentation and specifications created for your use
Final deliverables as defined in the project scope
Data and content you provide to us

s5_2.title: 5.2 Transformer Labs Retention
items: Our general methodologies, frameworks, and processes
Pre-existing intellectual property and tools
Reusable code libraries and components we develop
Know-how and expertise gained during the project
The right to use de-identified data for service improvement

s5_3.title: 5.3 Third-Party Rights
s5_3.intro: We ensure our deliverables don't infringe third-party rights, but you're responsible for:
items: Content and data you provide
Third-party services and APIs you choose to integrate
Compliance with software licenses for tools you select

s6_1.title: 6.1 Our Warranties
items: Services will be performed with professional skill and care
We have the right to provide the services
Deliverables will substantially conform to agreed specifications
We will not knowingly introduce malicious code

s6_2.title: 6.2 Warranty Period
s6_2.intro: We provide a 90-day warranty on deliverables to:
items: Fix defects that prevent substantial conformance to specifications
Correct errors in functionality as originally delivered
Address documentation inaccuracies
s6_2.exclusion: This warranty excludes issues caused by modifications, third-party integrations, or changes to the operating environment.

s6_3.title: 6.3 DISCLAIMER
s6_3.content: EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY STATED, WE PROVIDE SERVICES "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. WE DISCLAIM ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES INCLUDING MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR MEET ALL YOUR REQUIREMENTS.

s7_1.title: 7.1 Damages Cap
s7_1.content: Our total liability for any project will not exceed the fees paid by you for that specific project.

s7_2.title: 7.2 Excluded Damages
s7_2.content: We are not liable for indirect, consequential, incidental, special, or punitive damages, including lost profits, business interruption, or data loss, even if advised of the possibility.

s7_3.title: 7.3 Exceptions
items: Our breach of confidentiality obligations
Intentional misconduct or gross negligence
Violations of intellectual property rights
Damages that cannot be limited under applicable law

s8_1.title: 8.1 Mutual Obligations
items: Protect confidential information using reasonable care
Use confidential information only for authorized purposes
Not disclose confidential information to third parties
Return or destroy confidential information upon termination

s8_2.title: 8.2 Exceptions
s8_2.intro: Confidentiality obligations don't apply to information that:
items: Is publicly available or becomes public through no breach
Was known before disclosure
Is independently developed without using confidential information
Must be disclosed by law or court order

s9_1.title: 9.1 Termination for Convenience
s9_1.intro: Either party may terminate with 30 days' written notice. You will pay for:
items: All work completed before termination
Costs incurred for ongoing work
Non-cancellable commitments made on your behalf

s9_2.title: 9.2 Termination for Cause
s9_2.intro: Either party may terminate immediately for:
items: Material breach of these terms (if not cured within 15 days of notice)
Non-payment of undisputed amounts (after 30 days of notice)
Insolvency or bankruptcy proceedings
Violation of confidentiality obligations

s9_3.title: 9.3 Effect of Termination
items: We will provide completed deliverables upon payment
Each party returns or destroys confidential information
Payment obligations for completed work survive
Intellectual property provisions remain in effect

s10_1.title: 10.1 Client Indemnification
s10_1.intro: You agree to indemnify us against claims arising from:
items: Your use of deliverables in violation of these terms
Content, data, or materials you provide
Your violation of applicable laws or third-party rights
Modifications you make to our deliverables

s10_2.title: 10.2 Our Indemnification
s10_2.intro: We will indemnify you against claims that our deliverables infringe third-party intellectual property rights, provided you:
items: Notify us promptly of any claims
Give us control of the defense and settlement
Cooperate reasonably with our defense

s11.title: 11. Force Majeure
s11.intro: Neither party is liable for delays or failures due to events beyond reasonable control, including:
items: Natural disasters, pandemics, or public health emergencies
War, terrorism, or civil unrest
Government actions, sanctions, or regulatory changes
Internet outages, cyber attacks, or infrastructure failures
Labor strikes or supplier failures
s11.mitigation: The affected party must notify the other promptly and use reasonable efforts to mitigate the impact.

s12_1.title: 12.1 Governing Law
s12_1.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Palestine, without regard to conflict of laws principles.

s12_2.title: 12.2 Dispute Resolution
items: Direct Negotiation: Parties will first attempt to resolve disputes through good faith negotiations
Mediation: If negotiation fails, disputes will be submitted to mediation
Arbitration: Unresolved disputes will be settled by binding arbitration
Court Jurisdiction: Courts in Palestine have exclusive jurisdiction for enforcement

s12_3.title: 12.3 International Enforcement
s12_3.content: For international clients, we agree that this agreement may be enforced in the courts of your jurisdiction for collection purposes, provided Palestine law still governs the interpretation of terms.

s13.title: 13. General Provisions

s13_1.title: 13.1 Entire Agreement
s13_1.content: These terms, together with project-specific contracts and statements of work, constitute the entire agreement between us.

s13_2.title: 13.2 Modifications
s13_2.content: We may update these terms periodically. Material changes will be communicated via email or website notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

s13_3.title: 13.3 Severability
s13_3.content: If any provision is found unenforceable, the remainder of these terms remains in effect.

s13_4.title: 13.4 Assignment
s13_4.content: You may not assign these terms without our written consent. We may assign to affiliates or in connection with business transfers.

s13_5.title: 13.5 Independent Contractors
s13_5.content: We are independent contractors. These terms don't create partnership, joint venture, or agency relationships.

s13_6.title: 13.6 Notices
s13_6.content: Legal notices must be sent via email to

s13.s13_6_end: and are effective upon receipt acknowledgment.

s14.title: 14. Contact Information
s14.intro: Questions about these Terms of Service? Contact us:
s14.responseTime: We respond to legal inquiries within 5 business days.

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: Manage your cookie preferences for Transformer Labs. Choose which types of cookies you want to allow.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Essential cookies required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
analytics.examples: Page views, time on site, referral sources

functional.title: Functional
functional.description: Remember your preferences and settings for a better experience.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track ad performance.
